name: lease_id
description: SHA-256 hash of raw PDF bytes — primary deduplication key

name: source_url
description: Original URL the PDF was downloaded from

name: file_size_bytes
description: Size of the raw PDF in bytes

name: extracted_text
description: Full text extracted from the PDF (up to 10 pages). Null for non-TX or unclassifiable leases.

name: gemini_classification
description: Raw Gemini classification result: RESIDENTIAL_TX, NOT_RESIDENTIAL_TX, RESIDENTIAL_NOT_TX, NOT_RESIDENTIAL_NOT_TX, SKIPPED_NO_TEXT, ERROR

name: is_valid_tx_lease
description: True if Gemini confirmed this is a Texas residential lease. Only these rows are passed to the harness.

name: gcs_path
description: gs:// URI of the stored PDF. Only set for is_valid_tx_lease = TRUE.

name: scraped_at
description: UTC timestamp when this row was inserted
